00019 #ifndef _CUDA_FFT_IPP_cm140112_
00020 #define _CUDA_FFT_IPP_cm140112_

00022 #ifdef USE_CUDA
00023 #include <cuda_runtime.h>

00030 #include "shared_memory_mutex.hpp"

00032 namespace FFT {  
00033   namespace internal {
00035     class CUFFTArray {
00036     public:
00037       typedef float2 Complex;
00038 
00039       // in order to avoid compiler warning (type-punned pointer ...) we use this
00040       union device_data {
00041         Complex* c; // as *Complex
00042         void*    v; // as *void
00043         void** as_vpp() { return reinterpret_cast<void **>(&v); }
00044       } ;
00045 
00046       typedef boost::interprocess::scoped_lock<cuda_mutex::mutex_type> cuda_lock_type;
00047 
00048       CUFFTArray(size_t n)
00049         : in_(n)
00050         , out_(n)
00051         , norm_(n) {
00052         cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00053         checkCudaErrors(cudaMalloc(device_vec_.as_vpp(), n*sizeof(Complex)));
00054       }
00055       ~CUFFTArray() {
00056         cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00057         cudaFree(device_vec_.c);
00058       }
00059 
00060       size_t size() const { return in_.size(); }
00061       double norm() const { return norm_; }
00062 
00064       Complex&       in(size_t n)       { return in_[n]; }
00066       const Complex& in(size_t n) const { return in_[n]; }
00067 
00069       Complex&       out(size_t n)       { return out_[n]; }
00071       const Complex& out(size_t n) const { return out_[n]; }
00072 
00074       cufftComplex* device_vec() { return device_vec_.c; }
00075       
00077       void resize(size_t n) {
00078         in_.resize(n);
00079         out_.resize(n);
00080         cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00081         cudaFree(device_vec_.c);
00082         checkCudaErrors(cudaMalloc(device_vec_.as_vpp(), n*sizeof(Complex)));
00083       }
00084 
00086       void host_to_device() {
00087         cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00088         checkCudaErrors(cudaMemcpy(device_vec_.c, &in_.front(), size()*sizeof(Complex), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));    
00089       }
00091       void device_to_host() {
00092         cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00093         checkCudaErrors(cudaMemcpy(&out_.front(), device_vec_.c, size()*sizeof(Complex), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
00094       }
00095   
00097       template<typename V,
00098                template<typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00099       double fill(const std::vector<std::complex<V> >& v,
00100                   const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00101         return fill(v.begin(), v.end(), window_fcn);
00102       }
00104       template<typename V,
00105                template<typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00106       double fill(typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i0,
00107                   typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i1,
00108                   const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00109         const size_t length(std::distance(i0, i1));
00110         if (length != size()) resize(length);
00111         norm_= 0;
00112         Complex cc;
00113         for (unsigned u(0), n(size()); u<n; ++u, ++i0) {
00114           const double w(window_fcn(u));
00115           norm_ += w;
00116 #if 1
00117           cc.x = w * i0->real();
00118           cc.y = w * i0->imag();
00119           in_[u] = cc;
00120 #else 
00121           in_[u].x = w * i0->real();
00122           in_[u].y = w * i0->imag();
00123 #endif
00124         }
00125         return norm_;
00126       }
00127 
00128     protected:
00129     private:
00130       std::vector<Complex> in_;
00131       std::vector<Complex> out_;
00132       device_data          device_vec_;
00133       double               norm_;
00134     } ;
00135   } // namespace internal
00136 
00139   class CUFFTTransform {
00140   public:
00141     typedef boost::interprocess::scoped_lock<cuda_mutex::mutex_type> cuda_lock_type;
00142 
00144     CUFFTTransform(size_t n, int direction, unsigned flags=0 /* not used, compatibility to FFTW*/)
00145       : vec_(n)
00146       , normalization_factor_(vec_.norm())
00147       , direction_(direction) {
00148       cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00149       checkCudaErrors(cufftPlan1d(&plan_, n, CUFFT_C2C, 1));
00150       checkCudaErrors(cufftSetCompatibilityMode(plan_, CUFFT_COMPATIBILITY_FFTW_ALL));
00151     }
00152     ~CUFFTTransform() {
00153       cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00154       cufftDestroy(plan_);
00155     }
00157     void resize(size_t n) {
00158       {
00159         cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00160         cufftDestroy(plan_);
00161         checkCudaErrors(cufftPlan1d(&plan_, n, CUFFT_C2C, 1));
00162         checkCudaErrors(cufftSetCompatibilityMode(plan_, CUFFT_COMPATIBILITY_FFTW_ALL));
00163       }
00164       vec_.resize(n);
00165     }
00166     
00168     size_t size() const { return vec_.size(); }
00169 
00171     std::complex<float> getBin(size_t i) const {
00172       std::complex<float> r(vec_.out(i).x, vec_.out(i).y);
00173       r *= normalization_factor_;
00174       return r;
00175     }
00177     std::complex<float>& in(size_t i) { return reinterpret_cast<std::complex<float>& >(vec_.in(i)); }
00178     const std::complex<float>& in(size_t i) const { return reinterpret_cast<const std::complex<float>& >(vec_.in(i)); }
00179 
00181     std::complex<float>& out(size_t i) { return reinterpret_cast<std::complex<float>& >(vec_.out(i)); }
00182     const std::complex<float>& out(size_t i) const { return reinterpret_cast<const std::complex<float>& >(vec_.out(i)); }
00183   
00185     double normWindow() const { return vec_.size() * normalization_factor_; }
00186 
00188     template<typename V,
00189              template <typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00190     void transformVector(const std::vector<std::complex<V> >& v,
00191                          const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00192       transformRange(v.begin(), v.end(), window_fcn);
00193     }
00195     template<typename V,
00196              template <typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00197     void transformRange(typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i0,
00198                         typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i1,
00199                         const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00200       const size_t length(std::distance(i0, i1));
00201       if (length != size())
00202         resize(length);
00203       vec_.fill(i0, i1, window_fcn);
00204       normalization_factor_= 1./vec_.norm();
00205     
00206       transform();
00207     }
00209     void transform() {
00210       host_to_device();
00211       transform_on_device();
00212       device_to_host();
00213     }
00214 
00215   protected:
00216     void host_to_device() {
00217       vec_.host_to_device();
00218     }
00219     void device_to_host() {
00220       vec_.device_to_host();
00221     }
00222     void transform_on_device() {
00223       cuda_lock_type lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00224       checkCudaErrors(cufftExecC2C(plan_, vec_.device_vec(), vec_.device_vec(), direction_));
00225       checkCudaErrors(cudaThreadSynchronize());
00226     }
00227   private:
00228     cufftHandle          plan_;
00229     internal::CUFFTArray vec_;
00230     double               normalization_factor_;
00231     int                  direction_;
00232   } ;
00233 
00234 } // namespace FFT
00235 
00236 #endif // USE_CUDA
